text: NEVER reference Claude, Claude Code, AI assistance commit messages NEVER reference Claude, Claude Code, AI assistance PR descriptions NEVER add Co-Authored-lines mentioning Claude Anthropic Keep commit messages focused changed, written

title: Authors and Citation
text: Al Martin. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Martin (2026). utschooldata: Fetch Process Utah School Data. R package version 0.1.0, https://almartin82.github.io/utschooldata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data},   author = {Al Martin},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://almartin82.github.io/utschooldata}, }

title: Utah School Data
text: R package fetching, processing, analyzing school enrollment data Utah’s State Board Education (USBE). provides programmatic interface Utah public school data, enabling researchers, analysts, education policy professionals easily access Utah public school enrollment data.

title: Utah School Data
text: can install development version utschooldata GitHub:

title: Utah School Data
code: library(utschooldata)  # Get 2024 enrollment data (2023-24 school year) enr_2024 <- fetch_enr(2024)  # View state totals enr_2024 %>%   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL")  # Get data for multiple years enr_multi <- fetch_enr_multi(2020:2024)  # Analyze enrollment trends enr_multi %>%   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") %>%   select(end_year, n_students)

title: Utah School Data
text: Earliest available year: 2018 recent available year: 2026 Total years data: 9 years

title: Utah School Data
text: Data downloaded Utah State Board Education (USBE) Data Statistics portal: Primary URL: https://schools.utah.gov/datastatistics/reports File Pattern: {YEAR}FallEnrollmentGradeLevelDemographics.xlsx Collection Date: October 1 school year (Fall Enrollment count)

title: Utah School Data
text: State: Total Utah enrollment District (LEA): Local Education Agency totals (aggregated schools) Campus (School): Individual school enrollment

title: Utah School Data
text: Data Suppression: Small cell sizes may suppressed privacy (typically N < 10) Charter Schools: Charter schools included can identified charter_flag column available Historical Changes: District boundaries school configurations may change year year October 1 Count: enrollment figures represent official October 1 count date Pre-2018 Data: Detailed enrollment data prior 2018 available package; historical summary data may available Superintendent’s Annual Report

title: Utah School Data
text: package caches downloaded data locally avoid repeated downloads: Cache location: rappdirs::user_cache_dir("utschooldata")
code: # View cache status cache_status()  # Clear all cached data clear_cache()  # Clear specific year clear_cache(2024)  # Force fresh download (ignore cache) fetch_enr(2024, use_cache = FALSE)

title: Utah School Data
text: fetch_enr(end_year, tidy = TRUE, use_cache = TRUE) - Fetch enrollment data single year fetch_enr_multi(end_years, tidy = TRUE, use_cache = TRUE) - Fetch data multiple years tidy_enr(df) - Transform wide format tidy format get_available_years() - List available data years id_enr_aggs(df) - Add aggregation level flags enr_grade_aggs(df) - Create K-8, HS, K-12 grade aggregates cache_status() - Show cached data status clear_cache(end_year, type) - Clear cached data

what: Part of the 50 State Schooldata Family
title: Utah School Data
text: package part family R packages providing school enrollment data 50 US states. package fetches data directly state’s Department Education. See also: njschooldata - original state schooldata package New Jersey. packages: github.com/almartin82

Fetch Utah enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: Downloads processes enrollment data Utah State Board Education (USBE) Fall Enrollment reports.

title: Fetch Utah enrollment data — fetch_enr
Fetch Utah enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: end_year school year. Year end academic year - e.g., 2023-24 school year year '2024'. Valid values 2014-2026. Note data availability: Years 2019-2026: Full State, LEA (district), School-level data Years 2014-2018: State-level totals (historical time series) tidy TRUE (default), returns data long (tidy) format subgroup column. FALSE, returns wide format. use_cache TRUE (default), uses locally cached data available. Set FALSE force re-download USBE.

title: Fetch Utah enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: Data frame enrollment data. Wide format includes columns district_id, campus_id, names, enrollment counts demographic/grade. Tidy format pivots counts subgroup grade_level columns. years 2014-2018, state-level totals returned.

title: Fetch Utah enrollment data — fetch_enr
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get 2024 enrollment data (2023-24 school year) enr_2024 <- fetch_enr(2024)  # Get wide format enr_wide <- fetch_enr(2024, tidy = FALSE)  # Force fresh download (ignore cache) enr_fresh <- fetch_enr(2024, use_cache = FALSE)  # Filter to specific district salt_lake <- enr_2024 %>%   dplyr::filter(grepl("Salt Lake", district_name, ignore.case = TRUE))  # Historical state-level data (2014-2018) state_2015 <- fetch_enr(2015)  # State totals only } # }

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
text: end_years Vector school year ends (e.g., c(2022, 2023, 2024)) tidy TRUE (default), returns data long (tidy) format. use_cache TRUE (default), uses locally cached data available.

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
text: Combined data frame enrollment data requested years

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get 3 years of data enr_multi <- fetch_enr_multi(2022:2024)  # Track enrollment trends enr_multi %>%   dplyr::filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") %>%   dplyr::select(end_year, n_students) } # }

what: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: Downloads processes school enrollment data Utah State Board Education (USBE). Provides functions fetching enrollment data USBE data reports transforming tidy format analysis. Supports data 2014 present. Full State, LEA (district), School-level data available 2019 onwards, grade-level demographic breakdowns. Historical state-level totals available 2014-2018. utschooldata package provides functions downloading, processing, analyzing school enrollment data Utah State Board Education (USBE). offers programmatic interface Utah's public school data, enabling researchers, analysts, education policy professionals easily access Utah public school enrollment data.

title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: fetch_enr: Download process enrollment data single year fetch_enr_multi: Download process enrollment data multiple years tidy_enr: Transform wide data tidy (long) format get_available_years: List available data years

title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: cache_status: Show cached data status clear_cache: Clear cached data

title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: Utah enrollment data includes: School-level enrollment counts Grade-level breakdowns (K-12) Demographic breakdowns (race/ethnicity) Special population counts (ELL, Special Ed, Economically Disadvantaged)

title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: Years: 2018 present (updated annually) Aggregation levels: State, District (LEA), School (Campus) Source: Utah State Board Education (USBE) Data Statistics

title: utschooldata: Fetch and Process Utah School Data — utschooldata-package
text: LEA/District ID: Numeric identifier Local Education Agency School ID: Numeric identifier individual schools
